question: Comet Hyakutake orbits the sun every 60 years. Ethan's dad saw the Comet when he was 46 years old. Ethan saw the comet a second time when he was two times the age his dad was when he saw the Comet. How old was Ethan when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Ethan saw the Comet for the second time when he was 46 years * 2= <<46*2=92>>92 years old.
Comet Hyakutake can be seen every 60 years, so Ethan saw the comet for the first time when he was 92 years - 60 years = <<92-60=32>>32 years old.
#### 32
